scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:worker && npm run build:frontend
scripts.detect-secrets: npm run --silent detect-secrets:exists && (git diff --staged --name-only | xargs detect-secrets-hook --baseline .secrets.baseline)
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Shared,Backend,Sender,Logger,Frontend" -c "green.bold,yellow.bold,cyan.bold,blue.bold,white.bold" "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:worker:sender" "npm run dev:worker:logger" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:worker:sender: npm run wait:backend && cd worker && npm run dev:sender
scripts.dev:worker:logger: npm run wait:backend && cd worker && npm run dev:logger
scripts.postinstall: npm run postinstall:shared && npm run postinstall:backend && npm run postinstall:worker && npm run postinstall:frontend
scripts.precommit: npm run precommit:frontend && npm run precommit:backend && npm run precommit:worker && npm run precommit:shared && npm run precommit:root
scripts.precommit:root: lint-staged && sh check-env-format.sh && npm run detect-secrets
